summary: 1998 DODGE STRATUS HEAD GASKET CRACKED I HAVE 48 THOUSAND MILES ON THE CAR OIL LEAKING INTO THE COOLING SYSTEM CALLED CHRYSLER THEY WERE NO HELP AT ALL  THIS SEEMS TO BE A VERY COMMON PROBLEM  WITH THE DODGE STRATUSTHIS IS GOING TO COST ME BETWEEN EIGHT AND NINE HUNDRED DOLLARS.I FEEL THE COMPANY   SHOULD MAKE GOOD OF THIS PROBLEMI ALSO UNDERSTAND THERE MAY BE A CLASS ACTION SUIT AGAINST THEM. HOPE THERE IS SOMETHING YOU CAN DO TO HELP WITH THIS PROBLEM.I HONESTLY DON'T FEEL THIS TYPE OF REPAIR SHOULD HAVE TO BE DONE AT 48 THOUSAND MILES
